i18n.key: the description of the method is shown during the selection of the shipping method in the ordering process.
Code identifying the shipping method, which can be used to identify the method in order exports.

This URL address allows your customers to track their package in real time on the Internet. Use the {NumeroColis} tag to specify where to place the tracking number in this address: it will be replaced by the tracking number set in the order.
label of the shipping method, used in the backoffice and on the websites to identify the method.
